definition: to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb
relay baton/(fig.) responsibilities (passed over to one's successor)

sentences.english: This torch is then carried by a relay of runners to the site of the Summer or Winter games.
sentences.chinese: 之後這支火炬由跑者接力送至夏季或冬季比賽地點。

sentences.english: They both passed on their bacons at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 他們倆都同時把接力棒傳了過去。

sentences.english: Leave me the deepest impact is the relay RACES.
sentences.chinese: 給我留下影響最深的是接力比賽。

sentences.english: The result shows that zinc phosphate cement is the most retentive cement.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，磷酸鋅粘固劑所獲粘接力最大。

sentences.english: In ancient times the messages were relayed from one place to another.
sentences.chinese: 古時候信息是用接力的方式從一地傳送到另一地。

sentences.english: The lateral neck skin relay expansion method;
Chen Yuan is picked to run in the delay?
sentences.chinese: 如果陳元被選中參加接力賽怎麼辦？

sentences.english: They say I am the black sheep of the relay race .
sentences.chinese: 他們說我是接力賽的害羣之馬。

sentences.english: I'll try my best in the relay race.
sentences.chinese: 接力比賽中我將盡我最大努力。

sentences.english: The torch relay has drawn a wave of anti-China protests during stopovers in Europe and the Americas following Beijing's crackdown last month on Tibet unrest.
sentences.chinese: 奧運火炬接力在歐洲和美國遭遇嚴重的示威抗議活動。

sentences.english: When gate opening change, the relay connecting rod brings the magnetic head to move together.
sentences.chinese: 導葉開度變化時，接力器活塞桿帶着磁頭一起移動。

sentences.english: I was very glad when the boys won the relay race.
sentences.chinese: 男同學們贏得了接力賽跑，我非常高興。

sentences.english: A school sports, I participated in the women's 400-meter relay.
sentences.chinese: 一次黌舍活動會上，我加入了女子400米接力競走。

sentences.english: Olympic torch relay has been decided with Hangzhou as a stop.
sentences.chinese: 北京奧運火炬接力路線已經確定，杭州是其中一站。
